languages.text: {n}По внутреннему каналу связи раздается хмыканье кормчего.{/n}"Как же, "торговая станция". Все в Просторе знают, что это — пиратское логово, где торгуют награбленным. Но, правды ради, покупателей они не трогают, видать, потому до сих пор и живы".

{n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."
languages.original_text: {n}По внутреннему каналу связи раздается хмыканье кормчего.{/n}"Как же, "торговая станция". Все в Просторе знают, что это — пиратское логово, где торгуют награбленным. Но, правды ради, покупателей они не трогают, видать, потому до сих пор и живы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal comms channel.{/n}"A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate's den, where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

{n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

{n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

languages.text: {n}Du hörst das Schnauben des Steuermanns über den internen Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Eine Handelsstation? Erzählt das jemand anderem. Jeder in der Ausdehnung weiß, dass die Station ein Piratennest ist, in dem sie ihren gestohlenen Plunder verschachern. Allerdings lassen sie ihre Finger von den Kunden. Das ist wohl der Grund, warum sie noch leben."
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst das Schnauben des Steuermanns über den internen Vox-Kanal.{/n} "Eine Handelsstation? Erzählt das jemand anderem. Jeder in der Ausdehnung weiß, dass die Station ein Piratennest ist, in dem sie ihren gestohlenen Plunder verschachern. Allerdings lassen sie ihre Finger von den Kunden. Das ist wohl der Grund, warum sie noch leben."

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez le maître timonier s'esclaffer, sur le canal-vox interne.{/n} « Une station commerciale ? Peuh, la bonne blague ! Tout le monde dans les Étendues sait que c'est un repaire de pirates et la plaque tournante de leur butin mal acquis. Cela dit, il faut reconnaître qu'ils ne s'en prennent jamais à leurs clients, raison pour laquelle ils sont encore en vie à ce jour. »
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez le maître timonier s'esclaffer, sur le canal-vox interne.{/n} « Une station commerciale ? Peuh, la bonne blague ! Tout le monde dans les Étendues sait que c'est un repaire de pirates et la plaque tournante de leur butin mal acquis. Cela dit, il faut reconnaître qu'ils ne s'en prennent jamais à leurs clients, raison pour laquelle ils sont encore en vie à ce jour. »

languages.text: {n}Oyes reír entre dientes al timonel a través del canal de voco interno.{/n} «¿Una estación comercial? Ya, y qué más. Todo el mundo en la Extensión sabe que esto es un cubil de piratas donde venden el botín robado. Aunque la verdad sea dicha, nunca tocan a los clientes, lo que probablemente explique cómo es que siguen vivos».
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes reír entre dientes al timonel a través del canal de voco interno.{/n} «¿Una estación comercial? Ya, y qué más. Todo el mundo en la Extensión sabe que esto es un cubil de piratas donde venden el botín robado. Aunque la verdad sea dicha, nunca tocan a los clientes, lo que probablemente explique cómo es que siguen vivos».

languages.text: {n}ヘルムズマンの唸り声が船内放送チャンネルから聞こえる。{/n}「交易ステーションだと？もう一方を引き上げろ。ここは海賊の巣窟で、盗んだ略奪品を売りさばいていることはエクスパンスの誰もが知っていることだ。だが、公平を期すために、客には手を出さない。それが連中がまだ生きている理由だろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヘルムズマンの唸り声が船内放送チャンネルから聞こえる。{/n}「交易ステーションだと？もう一方を引き上げろ。ここは海賊の巣窟で、盗んだ略奪品を売りさばいていることはエクスパンスの誰もが知っていることだ。だが、公平を期すために、客には手を出さない。それが連中がまだ生きている理由だろう」

languages.text: {n}舵手长的哼声从内部音阵频道里传来。{/n}“贸易站？放他娘的屁。科罗努斯扩区所有人都知道这里是海盗的巢穴，他们在贩卖抢来的东西。但老实说，他们从来没碰过客户一根手指头，可能也正是因为这个原因，他们还活得好好的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."

languages.text: {n}Dâhilî voks kanalı üzerinden serdümenin homurtusu duyuluyor.{/n} "Ticaret istasyonu mu? Ben de inandım. Enginlik'teki herkes, buranın bir korsan ini olduğunu bilir. Burada yağmaladıkları çalıntı malları satarlar. Dürüst olmak gerekirse müşterilere asla dokunmazlar. Muhtemelen hâlâ hayatta olmalarının nedeni de bu."
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman's snort is heard over the internal vox-channel.{/n} "A trading station? Pull the other one. Everyone in the Expanse knows that this is a pirate den where they peddle the stolen plunder. But to be fair, they never touch the customers, which is probably why they are still alive."
